The Wandering Spirit Lv. 2.desc: Deeper within the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to get some valuable Material Units!

The Wandering Spirit Lv. 3.desc: The deepest reaches of the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some rare Material Units!

The Wandering Spirit Lv. 4.desc: This hidden area is home to dangerous relics from heroes and warriors all over. Now's your chance to get these otherwise hard to get materials!

The Warrior and the Dragon.desc: The mountain path slowly turns downhill. As your trip around this beautiful mountain comes to an end you almost feel sad, but you must hurry forward.

The White Altar.desc: The enemy attacks increase further in ferocity. But their primitive, brute force approach is evidence that you are hot on Mare's tail.

The White Horse of Light.desc: A shining, gallant white horse blocks the path. It defends its position, attacking mercilessly.

The World Tree.desc: You've finally reached the end of the crimson forest. You see a color other than red and race towards it.

The World in Her Eyes.desc: The entrance to the Spirit World is now within view. All that's left is to believe in Tilith's words and move forth, knocking away any who get in your way.

The Young Girl's Guardian.desc: The enemies attack quite aggressively. It's as if they're determined to keep anyone from setting foot inside the old capital.

Thick Darkness.desc: Entering the cave from the bright mountain path, your eyes have yet to adjust. Despite the dim light, the cave is considerably dark.

Thief from the Skies.desc: You move forward as lightning strikes down all around you. Beware of incoming aerial attacks.

Thief of the Forest.desc: Dark forests like this are usually full of bandits. Is it that they work better in the Dark? Either way, be careful.

Those Who Covet Death.desc: These grounds are haunted by those who couldn't be saved. It serves no purpose other than to create further casualties.

Those Who Live by the Sword.desc: These ruins were once the capital of Agni, known as Mirvana. Exposed to the worst of warfare, the city still bears its scars.

Thunder Blasting Wetlands.desc: Lightning occasionally roars throughout this damp land. It's quite unpleasant here. Prepare yourself for thunder.

Thunder Metal Parade.desc: A grand procession featuring Thunder Metal monsters with loads of Thunder experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!

Thunder Turnout Lv. 1.desc: A storm has been brewing across the vast skies of Grand Gaia, and where there is a storm, thunder is bound to follow.

Thunder Turnout Lv. 2.desc: Do you hear the thunder? It's coming for you. They're coming for you. Can you thrive above the lightning, or will you kneel to their bolts of power?

Thunderous Nemeses.desc: Two beasts block your path forward through the Gadillian Ravine. One has an enormous body, while the other is a wild and beastly warrior.

Time to Vanquish.desc: The ominous clouds begin to clear, a sign that you may have made it out of your crisis. Yet taking a break now would be most dangerous.

To Sacrifice One's Body.desc: The terrain here is not as rough. Perhaps this is where Mare will strike. Prepare yourself for her attack.

To the Abominable Castle.desc: You've finally reached Maxwell's stronghold. You continue forward, having vowed to Tilith to destroy this depraved god.

To the Crimson Forests.desc: Beyond the sacred mountain lies the Blood Forest. Tilith is acting a bit odd, though, she might be sick...

Tombstone of Light.desc: A salty breeze wafts through the tomb, hinting at where it extends. Perhaps Karl is being held there.

Treading on Thin Ice.desc: Before you lies a frozen lake. It seems the only way to get to the beach on the other side is to cross over it. Be careful as you proceed forth.

Trespasser into the Mind.desc: At last you have found Mare in a room at the back of the altar. Show her that she is no match for the human bond you share with your friends.

Trial 01 - Burning Desire.desc: The gods thus granted a spirit with burning desire to trimph in battle, the strongest of its kind.

Trial 02 - Destructive Force.desc: An ancient destructive force reanimated and energized to its very limit.

Trial 03 - Ultimate Defense.desc: The gods gave the demon the spirit of ultimate defense, strengthed its power, sharpened its claws.

Trial No. 001.desc: You think you have what it takes to defeat my mock Units? You should be really familiar with your opponent this time! I wonder how long you'll last?

Trial No. 002.desc: Hmm, you're better than I expected. However, if you think you can beat my next Unit, you're wrong! I doubt you'll even be able to survive the first blow!

Trial by Fire.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 2 - The days he ventured in search of strength. His countless fierce battles gave birth to the "Hero of the Fierce Flame."

Trial by Firestorm.desc: Rain pours down with incessant lightning. Just as you start to suspect that enemies lurk here, an ambush strikes from above!

Trials in the Forest.desc: Unlike the tundra, the forest is full of what looks like landmarks. But they are starting to lead you astray as you trip over the thick grass.

Ultimate Paradise.desc: Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.

Uncharted Frontier - End.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - End 2.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - End 3.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - End 4.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - End 5.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - End 6.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - End 7.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.

Uncharted Frontier - Entrance 3.desc: You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but nevertheless you mustn't be careless.

Uncharted Frontier - Entrance 4.desc: You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but nevertheless you mustn't be careless.

Uncharted Frontier - Entrance 5.desc: You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but nevertheless you mustn't be careless.

Uncharted Frontier - Entrance 6.desc: You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but nevertheless you mustn't be careless.

Uncharted Frontier - Entrance 7.desc: You're at the entrance to the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The beasts here are somewhat weak, but nevertheless you mustn't be careless.

Uncharted Frontier - Middle.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Middle 2.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Middle 3.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Middle 4.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Middle 5.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Middle 6.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Middle 7.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…

Uncharted Frontier - Terminus 5.desc: You're at the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The air shakes as an awesome force descends upon you.

Uncharted Frontier - Terminus 6.desc: You're at the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The air shakes as an awesome force descends upon you.

Uncharted Frontier - Terminus 7.desc: You're at the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. The air shakes as an awesome force descends upon you.

Undaunted Uprising.desc: As the band grew stronger and larger, Leon now has an army that reaps through the regions stamping down on the corrupt rich and powerful, making himself their number one enemy within the Agni Empire.

Undying Wish.desc: Seria is as reckless as always. You worry about her wounds but can't stop now. You thank her for her impeccable timing and proceed onward.

Unholy Tower Floor 1-10.desc: You have arrived at the tower where the formidable monster is rumored to be dwelling. It's dark and the cold, still air sends a chill up your spine.

Unholy Tower Floor 101-110.desc: Wait… what the cursed knight has been fighting to guard wasn't the tower? What he was trying to protect was… what's that?!

Unholy Tower Floor 11-20.desc: Now that you've met the guardian of the tower, you start to feel less confident about this mission. What else lurks in the darkness?

Unholy Tower Floor 111-120.desc: It only took the monster a single strike to take down the knight you fought so hard against?! Are you sure you can take on the monster?

Unholy Tower Floor 121-130.desc: Now that Xenon is injured, you're the only one who can contain the monster. Hurry, before it escapes the tower!

Unholy Tower Floor 131-140.desc: Oh no! You lost sight of the monster! Where is it? There's no time to waste… you need to track it down before it can ambush you!

Unholy Tower Floor 141-150.desc: The darkness is putting you at a great disadvantage, but you can hear the monster's heartbeat from a distance. Wait, was that your own heartbeat instead?

Unholy Tower Floor 151-160.desc: The continuous climb and seemingly endless battles have taken a toll on you, but your mission is not over. Xenon is pinning his hopes on you, Summoner.

Unholy Tower Floor 161-170.desc: Is that the best you can do? You need to muster more energy and power to complete this mission! Pull yourself together and charge forth!

Unholy Tower Floor 171-180.desc: The monster seems to be getting stronger and stronger. Can you keep up? If you give up now, it's not going to leave a nice impression on your record…

Unholy Tower Floor 181-190.desc: There's no time to rest! The monster must be getting exhausted too, this is your chance to attack! Did you lose sight of it again?

Unholy Tower Floor 191-200.desc: It has been a long, tough fight. You're so close to completing your mission! You're not going to give up now, are you?

Unholy Tower Floor 21-30.desc: So far so good, nothing you can't handle as of yet, but the spooky howls coming from the higher levels of the tower is something you can't ignore...

Unholy Tower Floor 31-40.desc: What's that?! A dark shadow just flashed past behind you. Or was it just your imagination? Stay alert, Summoner.

Unholy Tower Floor 41-50.desc: How many floors has it been? It's getting darker and the rain isn't stopping. Gleaming eyes are watching you from behind the shadows…

Unholy Tower Floor 51-60.desc: Watch out for the beasts and monsters, they haven't had a decent meal in ages… let your guard down and you might not live to see the sun rise again.

Unholy Tower Floor 61-70.desc: Your breathing seems heavier than before. Are you getting tired from the climb, or is the guardian of the tower pushing you to your limits?

Unholy Tower Floor 71-80.desc: He is hot on your heels, catching you at every turn and landing. You need to hurry! The ominous aura filling the air is getting thicker by the minute.

Unholy Tower Floor 81-90.desc: You can't let him get in your way now! You've come so far, the truth waiting to be unraveled is just a reach away…

Unholy Tower Floor 91-100.desc: You've reached the top of the tower!... Or have you not? It's too dark to see, but you can clearly sense a strong power beckoning in the darkness…

Unifier of Demons.desc: An evil air pervades the pitch-blackness of the mine’s innermost reaches. Exhausted by their travails, despair nibbles at the heart of any weary traveler on this road.

Unshakeable Fear.desc: The stench of death wafts through the air from the deep darkness. Where could this cave lead? This darkness is really unsettling.

Unwavering Slash.desc: Unlike the weather, the sandy terrain is less than ideal for combat. Walking so far from the city has also exhausted you.

Vagabond of the Monster's Den.desc: This cave not only looks horrid, but is also full to the brim with fearsome beings. You mustn't lose focus here or else.

Venture Inside.desc: What could be waiting unbeknownst to history in this ship that appeared so long ago? You can't deny your curiosity.

Vile Dreams Come True.desc: A devilish presence stands before you as a hazardous obstacle in your path. Be careful not to get seduced into a vulnerable state.

Wandering the Ruins.desc: You come to some vast and ancient ruins, cloaked in an air of solemnity. The time of Cordelica’s reckoning is soon at hand. Prepare yourself for the battle ahead.

Watchdog From Hell.desc: Magma is gushing out all over, and it's scorching hot as far as the eye can see. Nothing could possibly live here.

Water Metal Parade.desc: A grand procession featuring Water Metal monsters with loads of Water experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!

Wavering Ambition.desc: The air is ominous where a Fallen God was once sealed away. You can feel the presence of enemies exponentially more powerful than any you've seen before.

Waves of Fury Lv. 1.desc: Cool and dignified, she bows to no one but her trusty gatling gun which she has entrusted her life to.

Waves of Fury Lv. 2.desc: Known as the Gun Lady, she never lets her guard or her gun down. When it comes to the quick draw, she is second to none.

Waves of Fury Lv. 3.desc: It's no longer a matter of winning or losing. She wants revenge and she wants it fast. She has no time for those who can't keep up.

Wedging Deep.desc: Is Karl all right? Just as Tilith said, there must be a reason why Karl is being kept alive, so his life shouldn't be in danger, but still…

When Lightning Strikes Lv. 1.desc: A fighter who seeks great power to protect the one he loves. He pays attention only to those who exude the kind of power he desires.

When Lightning Strikes Lv. 2.desc: A fighter who travels the world in search of the one he loves. The encounters and experiences he absorbs along the way add to his burgeoning strength.

When Lightning Strikes Lv. 3.desc: A fighter with a kick powerful enough to crush even gods. Known as "Thunder Kick," he only has time for those who he thinks demonstrate enough power themselves.

When Lightning Strikes Lv. 4.desc: A fighter who has honed his abilities beyond godlike, every smiting kick he delivers smashes with lightning electrocution.

Where Empires Meet.desc: The crumbling paved road stretches forth, though there are no signs that humans ever lived in this area. Be cautious as you proceed.

Where Light Falls.desc: Many students with bright futures ahead of them once studied here. The presence awaiting you in this sacred place is one clad in light.

Where Lightning Strikes.desc: You emerge from what you thought was a never-ending tunnel to be greeted by a bright light, only to find out the light was actually a flash of lightning.

Where Thunder Pulses.desc: Continuing through the mines, you occasionally here the sound of thunder. Whether it's natural or the roar of some thunder beast, surely you'll find out soon.

Where the Light Points.desc: The air wafting through the tomb seems fresh and clean. Judging by the inscriptions on the wall, this place dates back to the Agni Empire.

Where the Light Shines.desc: What could that knight be thinking? How could anyone who fought and died for humanity's sake find themselves fighting for the gods!?

Wicked Hostility.desc: Resentment is one of the strongest emotions people have. Though it can sometimes be used as a motivating force to accomplish a goal, there are few who desire it.

Wielder of the Fire.desc: Continue deeper into the Cave of Flames. Beings who control fire are waiting ahead.

Wielder of the Light.desc: It appears that a sage with the power of light is in the ruins. A guardian, perhaps?

Wild Bravery.desc: Every building in the city looks plain yet sturdy. The fact that they've survived the ravages of war is testament to their expert craftsmanship.

Windswept Prairie.desc: You stop in a field, surprised by a mysterious man who now blocks your path. There's no time to loiter, you need to shake your fear and push ahead.

Wings of the Flaming Skies.desc: It's getting hotter and hotter as you near the mouth of the volcano. It's getting hard to even move...

World Tree and the Savior.desc: Among the many remaining legendary epics, there is a tale of a young boy who saved the World Tree. Could this be what has shown itself just now?

Year-End Bonus Day 1.desc: Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!

Year-End Bonus Day 2.desc: Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!

Young Flames.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 1 - Vargas, in his younger days. It wasn't long before the proud title he built for himself crumbled before him.
